title: Did Marilyn Monroe help Ella Fitzgerald with the book "Macambo Gig"?
subtitle: It is said that the actress pushed the popular music club to book Fitzgerald, but the viral image of the famous husband is often shared with an inaccurate context.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The Mocambo Night Club in Los Angeles refused to book Ella Fitzgerald because of her race but was eventually persuaded to do so by actress Marilyn Monroe.
